app.name: FCash

ios.info.plist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This will be added to InfoPlist.strings

S_Customer_Or_Business: Are you a customer or a Business ?
Your business name or store name: Your business name or store name
Address of your store or business: Address of your store or business
City where your store is located: City where your store is located
The Cash back rate is the rewards percen: The Cash back rate is the rewards percentage that the customer get on every purchase, for example if a customer buys 100
worth of merchandise or service and you: worth of merchandise or service and you offer 10% Cash back rate the customer will automatically get 10
in his electronic wallet wich he will us: in his electronic wallet wich he will use in his next purchase
The customers can get the extact locatio: The customers can get the extact location of your store when browsing the app and they can find you easily when you set your location, please be sure to be in your store when you click on get store location button
